website_summaries.verdict: Homeopathic eye drops that work well for sensitive eyes.
pros: Formulated with natural, homeopathic ingredients that are gentle for most users with sensitive eyes
Soothes irritated, itchy eyes and don't burn when used
cons: Relief may not be long-term for all users, requiring repeated use

customer_reviews.title: Best drops out there!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic dry eye, made worse after eye surgery. I have to use drops all day and they the night (or else my eye sticks to my eyelid, causing pain and damage). Other brands of drops left my eye lashes goopy and stuck together in the morning, or left my vision hazy after application. But these drops feel great, no sticky, gooey mess, and no haze, AND don't have a bunch of questionable ingredients in them!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Marie Smiley

customer_reviews.title: What works
customer_reviews.text: I have been thru my share of eye drops. They got especially dry after cataract surgery, and even developed an epithelial condition. So I make sure to do what I can to keep them moist. I ordered 2 bottles to begin with, and have used 1+, and my eyes feel way more comfortable. Other drops stay effective for a while, or irritate the tear ducts into producing tears. This just soothes with its homeopathic ingredients, and i find I am having to use it much less these days as my eyes are staying more comfortable. Nevertheless, I re-ordered so I wouldn't run out and the order came within the day (I live in Amazon's area).
customer_reviews.author: Shorsue

customer_reviews.title: Great product for dry eye relief
customer_reviews.text: I frequently wake up in the morning with really dry eyes. I found this eye drop a couple years ago and just ordered it again. It really helps with dry eyes and what I like most is the bottle. It's a glass bottle with a long pointed top. When you unscrew the lid, you can just squeeze the sides of the cone-shaped top to squirt out the liquid. It seems so much easier (and more accurate) than having to squeeze a firmer plastic bottle to get the liquid out. I would definitely recommend this eye drop.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have paid as much as $17.00 for a package of these eye drops (in an "organic" store). This is the best price I have found. I have used this product since 2014. It's very soothing for dry eyes and easy to administer with the large squeeze nozzle inside. And the product comes in a glass bottle, which gives me comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Best dry eye product on the market
customer_reviews.text: What I love is how soothing and moisturizing this product is to my eyes. Really relieves it. And the fact that it is plant based I can use a couple times a day without chemical to my eyes worrying. The product came really packed neat and was delivered earlier than expected. Thank you seller.
customer_reviews.author: joan underwood

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MOISTURIZER (NATURAL) FOR THE EYES
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that really works. When my eyes get too dry living in Colorado, I use these drops and they work immediately and well. I can use them often if necessary, but it usually isn't. I would never use any other brand with all those chemically medicated ones out there. This works and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy C. Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended, my eyes are very dry, I use systane for months but my eyes are dry and sensitive don’t work properly now , only first months. But I trying this for 2 days am feel better my eyes are hydrated. I recibed two for that price is great.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: really good dry eye relief but pricey
customer_reviews.text: My husband swears by this and I like these also, especially the fact that it's made to be "as close as it can to a natural tear" (that's from my husband's eye doctor). In my opinion, they're a little pricey but if your eyes are sensitive like my husband's I think they're worth the extra few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Comforting drops
customer_reviews.text: My ophthalmologist advised me, that Similasan is best for my eyes for dry eyes. It makes a big difference in easing my dry eyes.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseH

customer_reviews.title: This one works well for me because I'm so allergic to chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Mos eye drops from the Dr and even from inexpensive to very expensive from the doctor and I get opthalmic migraines because of a chemical most drops have for dry eyes. This one I have never had a reaction so I am pleased to say they help my dry eyes plus they don't give me migraines and that's major! I've tried REfRESH, and so many other options, but this one is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: timbo

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Drops
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all drops known to man. I like these, because they are natural and preservative free. Also, they don't have anti redness formulation that is notorious for rebound redness. Smooth, no sting when applied.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Santaniello

customer_reviews.title: Finally relief!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had dry eyes that keep getting worse for a while now. I’ve tried so many “moisturizing” eye drops and they just irritate my eyes more. I’ve been using a warm compress, which works, but I have to use it 3-4 times a day. After using these I only need it to use a compress 1-2 times a day. My eyes don’t burn anymore and they’re great for when I don’t have access to a compress. I highly suggest these eye drops. They’re amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacalyn Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The quality control of this supposed two-pack item was poor. Having set up a subscription I received a couple of orders that had the two-pack item, however on the most recent order, only one item was received of the supposed two-pack item. I pointed out the quality control issue and asked for a replacement. Once again quality control was an issue and only one of the two items was received. At that point I asked for a refund and cancelled the subscription due to the faulty quality control.
customer_reviews.author: George P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Eye Drops
customer_reviews.text: Love this natural brand for eye drops as I am allergic to many of the other box brands. These work well. Price per box here (in a 2 pack) is comparable to Walmart. I have used all their formulas, but my favorite is the allergy one, when I eat dairy I get red irritated eyes and the allergy drops clear that up!
customer_reviews.author: Tacey Reichman

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what's the going rate for drops but prices seems reasonable and I am happy with this product. I researched brands, this one does seem the healthiest and trustworthy. I like the dropper because it actually doesn't dispense a large drop, just a small amount goes a long way. It's helped immediately with soothing dry, irritated eyes.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Sting, Very Lubricating, Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I sit at my home desk with a fan blowing on me pretty much all day which causes my eyes to get dry. I love this brand already, but hadn't tried this dry eye relief version. This product is exactly what I wanted. Some cheaper eye drops sting my eyes. These drops are very lubricating and do not sting. Plus, I'm so happy I chose the 2 pack. I keep one by my desk and one by my bed. Awesomeness
customer_reviews.author: H. Rozzo

customer_reviews.title: My eyes are very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I used to reactively use the Similusan Allergy Eye Relief but found that proactive usage of this was better.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the sample from optomitrist
customer_reviews.text: I have never used eye drops until recently. Tried the sample drops given to me by my optomistrist and immediately felt that they made my eyes worse. Came on to amazon to look for a more homeopathic alternative and decided to try these. They work beautifully. Eyes feel better and I don’t feel I’m experiencing any eye “rebounding” from using them. Will continue use.

Perhaps this review will get attention, but more likely it will be rejected. So do not buy unless you want to pay double the price for one box of eye drops.

customer_reviews.title: Good for daytime
customer_reviews.text: I like the Similasan Eye Drops for daytime. They work well and I can carry the bottle with me. It doesn't have to be refrigerated. But they don't last through the night for me, probably because I have sometimes have a fan blowing, so I have to put drops in during the night when I wake up. For nighttime, I am using gel drops. I will purchase these drops again.
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and hydrating.
customer_reviews.text: I have intense dry eye and I’ve tried everything out there. Most commercial eyedrops leave my eyes feeling dryer than they were before the drops. These are good (and definitely more natural) drops for the day and really help when I’m working at the computer and forget to blink. Still trying to find a natural gel for the night, but I’m happy with these for the day. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fizzgig

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these drops for several years now, since my eye doctor recommended them after I mentioned that I sometimes felt like my eyes got stuck and tore a part of the inner lid (quite painful, though brief). I use one drop in each eye every morning, and I don't have trouble all day, unless I'm in an exceptionally dry environment or have fans in my face for lengthy periods of time. I live in Las Vegas, where the humidity is rarely over 15%, and it gives me no trouble. I like that I'm using something based on homeopathic principles rather than dumping chemicals into my body. I recommend this product highly if you have problems with dry eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried the all, this is our favorite
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for more than 25 years. It's great to know it's actually hydrating these old eye. Everyone swear by them, once I get them to try them. Young ones looking at computers all day, old ones reading books for a life time. Our Ophthalmologist is impressed our eyes are so hydrated at 65+

customer_reviews.title: REcommended they are very soothing
customer_reviews.text: I get really dry eyes and these drops helped me SO much I have been using them for about a year and I rarely if ever get irritated or red eyes anymore. The best part is they are homeopathic so no weird stuff in them! They really work and they feel really soothing. I use them first thing in the morning and last thing at night and if it's really bad allergy wise during the day also. They last quite a long time, are easy to apply and don't sting.
customer_reviews.author: Tres Hermanas

customer_reviews.title: great drops - no drugs
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these dry eye homeopathic drops for years especially during allergy season when my eyes dry up and turn into sand paper. The complete formula is the same as the dry eye formula and the allergy formula is great too for those who get the runny eyes. The red eye one is great too for relief from long hours at work or in front of a computer etc. We Love these drops. Since they are not a drug, you can use as much as you want as often as your want to achieve your needed level of relief, which we like as well. We suggest these to our patients all the time.

product_meta.title: Similasan Dry Eye Relief Eye Drops 0.33 Ounce Bottle, for Temporary Relief from Dry or Red Eyes, Itchy Eyes, Burning Eyes, and Watery Eyes, 2 Count
product_meta.description: Dry eyes are a common discomfort - reading, stress, contact lens wear, and staring at the screen all day can dry out your eyes. We all want our eyes to feel better, but many dry eye sufferers are concerned about the chemicals found in eye drops. Traditional over-the-counter drops use chemicals to mask symptoms. Similasan of Switzerland works differently, by using natural botanical extracts to stimulate the body's natural defenses and target the root cause. Similasan products are made without harsh chemicals, so you can use them as often as needed. Can be used with contact lenses. Drops will not damage lenses but performance might be better when applied without lenses. If you have redness, itchiness or irritation, it is best to avoid lenses for a while. Trusted by pharmacists and families in Switzerland for 40 years, Similasan is a leading Swiss brand of remedies that use natural active ingredients instead of harsh chemicals to keep families healthy. Our state of the art facility located near the Swiss Alps makes over 190 popular remedies for children and adults. Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. Not FDA evaluated.
feature_bullets: Similasan Dry Eye Relief drops provide temporary relief from dry eye symptoms like dryness, redness, burning, stinging, irritation and watering. Use as often as needed with no known side effects.
Similasan Dry Eye Relief eye drops stimulate the body's natural defenses instead of masking dryness symptoms like dry eyes, red eyes, burning eyes, stinging eyes, irritated eyes and watering eyes.
Similasan homeopathic eye drops are made with natural active ingredients like eyebright, not harsh chemicals. Similasan eye drops do not contain vasoconstrictors: chemicals that cause rebound effect.
For over 40 years, Similasan has been used by pharmacists and families in Switzerland. Similasan is a leading brand of homeopathic remedies with natural active ingredients to keep families healthy.
Similasan is a Swiss brand dedicated to helping families feel good about feeling better. Our gentle eye drops provide natural temporary relief from dry eye symptoms.
